Module org.nasdanika.architecture.c4
Package org.nasdanika.architecture.c4

Interface Container

All Superinterfaces:
org.nasdanika.common.Adaptable, ArchitectureElement, org.nasdanika.ncore.Documented, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.nasdanika.ncore.Marked, org.nasdanika.persistence.Marked, ModelElement, org.nasdanika.ncore.ModelElement, org.nasdanika.ncore.NamedElement, Node, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier, org.nasdanika.ncore.Period, TechnologyConsumer
All Known Implementing Classes:
ContainerImpl
public interface Container extends Node, TechnologyConsumer
A representation of the model object 'Container'.

The following features are supported:

  • Components
  • Children
See Also:
  • C4Package.getContainer()

  • Method Details

    • getComponents

      org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<Component> getComponents()
      Returns the value of the 'Components' containment reference list. The list contents are of type Component. Components consituting the container.
      Returns:
      the value of the 'Components' containment reference list.
      See Also:
      • C4Package.getContainer_Components()

    • getChildren

      org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<Container> getChildren()
      Returns the value of the 'Children' containment reference list. The list contents are of type Container. Containers can be nested. E.g. Tomcat may be running in a Docker container and serve multiple applications.
      Returns:
      the value of the 'Children' containment reference list.
      See Also:
      • C4Package.getContainer_Children()
